# Sample Document

This is a **test document** for the Pandoc plugin.

## Features

- Markdown to HTML conversion
- Markdown to Word conversion
- Multiple output formats supported

## Code Example

```python
def hello():
    print("Hello from Pandoc!")
```

## Table

| Format | Extension | Description |
|--------|-----------|-------------|
| HTML   | .html     | Web pages   |
| Word   | .docx     | Documents   |
| PDF    | .pdf      | Print-ready |

## Conclusion

Pandoc is a powerful document converter!

---

*Generated by Pandoc Plugin v1.0*
